# Data process

## Cuba

### Wave 1


| **Name** | `Q301` | `Q312`|
|-|-|-|
| **Label** | `30.1 Has ever felt suicidal or wished to be dead` | `31.2 In last year` |
| **Table name** | `1066-Cuba-Baseline` | `1066-Cuba-Baseline` |
| **Categories** |`0 = Never` <br/> `1 = Sometimes` | `0 = Never` <br/> `1 = Sometimes` |
| **Missing Values** | `8 = don't know` <br/> `9 = not applicable` | `8 = don't know` <br/> `9 = not applicable` | 
| **Description** |  | |


```{r assign_cuba1, echo=FALSE}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 't1066_si12m','10-66.1066-Cuba-Baseline',
                         variables=list('Q301', 'Q312'), missings = TRUE)
t1066_si12m <- opal.execute(o,'t1066_si12m')
```

```{r local_cuba1, echo=FALSE}
vbl <- t1066_si12m$Q301
vbl_miss <- 8:9
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = vbl_miss)[3], caption = 'wpdes')
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = vbl_miss)[1], caption = "Category")
ggplot(t1066_si12m, aes(x=factor(Q301))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")

vbl <- t1066_si12m$Q312
vbl_miss <- 8:9
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = vbl_miss)[3], caption = 'wpdes')
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = vbl_miss)[1], caption = "Category")
ggplot(t1066_si12m, aes(x=factor(Q312))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* if `Q301 = 0` into `0`
* if `Q301 = 1`
    + if `Q312 = 0` into `0`
    + if `Q312 = 1` into `1`
* if `Q301 = 8, 9 or NA` 
    + if `Q312 = 0` into `0`
    + if `Q312 = 1` into `1`
    + if `Q312 = 8` into `998`
    + if `Q312 = 9` into `996`
    + if `Q312 = NA` into `999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo_cuba1}
t1066_ds_cuba_w1 <- tibble(id=t1066_si12m$id)
t1066_ds_cuba_w1$suicidal_ideation_12m <- NA
t1066_ds_cuba_w1$suicidal_ideation_12m[t1066_si12m$Q301 == 0 | (t1066_si12m$Q301 == 1 & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 0) | (t1066_si12m$Q301 %in% 8:9 & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 0) | (is.na(t1066_si12m$Q301) & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 0)] <- 0

t1066_ds_cuba_w1$suicidal_ideation_12m[(t1066_si12m$Q301 == 1 & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 1) | (t1066_si12m$Q301 %in% 8:9 & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 1) | (is.na(t1066_si12m$Q301) & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 1)] <- 1

t1066_ds_cuba_w1$suicidal_ideation_12m[(t1066_si12m$Q301 %in% 8:9 & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 8) | (is.na(t1066_si12m$Q301) & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 8)] <- 998
t1066_ds_cuba_w1$suicidal_ideation_12m[(t1066_si12m$Q301 %in% 8:9 & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 9) | (is.na(t1066_si12m$Q301) & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 9)] <- 996

t1066_ds_cuba_w1$suicidal_ideation_12m[(is.na(t1066_si12m$Q301) & is.na(t1066_si12m$Q312))] <- 999
```

#### Statistics of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript_cuba1, echo=FALSE}
vari <- t1066_ds_cuba_w1$suicidal_ideation_12m
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = ds_label) 
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(t1066_ds_cuba_w1, aes(x=factor(suicidal_ideation_12m))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")
```

```{r importOPAL_cuba1, echo=FALSE}
suicidal_ideation_12m <- t1066_ds_cuba_w1
save(suicidal_ideation_12m, file = "../RData/cuba_w1/suicidal_ideation_12m.RData")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* if `Q301 = 0` into `0`
* if `Q301 = 1`
    + if `Q312 = 0` into `0`
    + if `Q312 = 1` into `1`
* if `Q301 = 8, 9 or NA` 
    + if `Q312 = 0` into `0`
    + if `Q312 = 1` into `1`
    + if `Q312 = 8` into `998`
    + if `Q312 = 9` into `996`
    + if `Q312 = NA` into `999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo_PR1}
t1066_ds_PR_w1 <- tibble(id=t1066_si12m$id)
t1066_ds_PR_w1$suicidal_ideation_12m <- NA
t1066_ds_PR_w1$suicidal_ideation_12m[t1066_si12m$Q301 == 0 | (t1066_si12m$Q301 == 1 & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 0) | (t1066_si12m$Q301 %in% 8:9 & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 0) | (is.na(t1066_si12m$Q301) & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 0)] <- 0

t1066_ds_PR_w1$suicidal_ideation_12m[(t1066_si12m$Q301 == 1 & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 1) | (t1066_si12m$Q301 %in% 8:9 & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 1) | (is.na(t1066_si12m$Q301) & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 1)] <- 1

t1066_ds_PR_w1$suicidal_ideation_12m[(t1066_si12m$Q301 %in% 8:9 & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 8) | (is.na(t1066_si12m$Q301) & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 8)] <- 998
t1066_ds_PR_w1$suicidal_ideation_12m[(t1066_si12m$Q301 %in% 8:9 & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 9) | (is.na(t1066_si12m$Q301) & t1066_si12m$Q312 == 9)] <- 996

t1066_ds_PR_w1$suicidal_ideation_12m[(is.na(t1066_si12m$Q301) & is.na(t1066_si12m$Q312))] <- 999
```

## Descriptive statistics of the harmonised variable accross populations and waves

Percentages of categories in each harmonised variable:



```{r helpfunctions, echo=F}


labelling <- function(l.hds,m.hds){
  
  # Labelling of the tibbles with categorical data and creating new tibbles with all missings recodified as NA

  for(name in names(l.hds)) {
    # In the aux_object we copy the old tibble to recodify all missing values as NA.
    aux_object <- l.hds[[name]]
    # Labelling of variables
    label(l.hds[[name]][[2]]) <- label(aux_object[[2]]) <- ds_label
    # Labelling of categories (for continues variables, only missing values)
    l.hds[[name]][[2]] <- labelled(l.hds[[name]][[2]], labels = cat_label)
    aux_object[[2]] <- car::recode(aux_object[[2]], "miss_values_vector=NA")
    # Labelling of categories (for categorical variables, only non-missing values)
    aux_object[[2]] <- labelled(aux_object[[2]], labels = cat_label[1:3])
  # Saving the recodified tibble in list m.hds
    m.hds[[name]] <- aux_object
    rm(aux_object)
  }
  return(list(l.hds,m.hds))

}

# Creation of summary tables for categorical data

summaries <- function(l.hds,m.hds,lnames){

  # Creation of columns with categories and labels
  t.hds <- frq(l.hds[[1]][2])[[1]][,c(1,2)] 
  # For each wave/population in l.hds, add the correponding values
  for (i in seq_along(l.hds)){
    t.hds[2+i] <- frq(l.hds[[i]][2])[[1]][,4] 
  }
  # Add sample size for each wave/population
  t.hds[14,] <- c("n", "sample size", sapply(l.hds,function(wave) length(wave[[1]]))
  )
  # Add wave/population names
  names(t.hds)<-c("val", "label",lnames)
  return(t.hds)
  
}


```
